question: Would you rather fight 100 duck-sized horses or 1 horse-sized duck?
Would you rather sneeze glitter or fart bubbles?
Would you rather have spaghetti hair or maple syrup sweat?
Would you rather only be able to whisper or only be able to shout?
Would you rather wear clown shoes every day or a tutu to every meeting?
Would you rather have a rewind button on your forehead or a pause button on your belly?
Would you rather talk like Yoda or breathe like Darth Vader?
Would you rather be chased by angry chickens once a week or have a cow stare at you daily?
Would you rather forget how to sit every time or how to stand every time?
Would you rather hiccup every time you laugh or burp every time you cry?
Would you rather have forks for fingers or spoons for toes?
Would you rather be stuck in a room full of mosquitoes or one full of your ex’s Instagram reels?
Would you rather always say what you're thinking or never speak again?
Would you rather teleport but end up slightly bald each time or fly but only at 5 km/h?
Would you rather swap noses with a parrot or ears with an elephant?
